content.question: The excerpt could best be used by historians to explain which of the following historical situations?

choices.label: Attempts by the United States to use its power to influence postwar peace settlements
Challenges to the economic influence of the United States as a result of the Second World War
Resistance to treaties between the United States and Asian nations by European colonial powers
Rejection of international engagement by isolationists in the United States government

content.answer: Attempts by the United States to use its power to influence postwar peace settlements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
